bibl.title: Medical Certification for Jesse W. Lazear, August 9, 1892

div1.p: Lazear has been entered in the Register of Physicians and Surgeons for New York County.

div1.head: Medical Certification for Jesse W. Lazear, August 9, 1892

opener.dateline: County Clerk's Office, City and County of New York.

div1.p: To whom it may Concern, Know ye, that on the 9th day of Aug- 1892

having first subscribed and verified an affidavit in the form of Schedule C of Chapter 647 of the Laws of 1887,
made an entry in the Register of Physicians and Surgeons, kept in the office of the Clerk of New York County, of
which entry I certify the following to be a transcript:

row.cell: Date, Source and Character of License or Diploma.

The Col. of Physicians
and Surgeons (Columbia)
June 8/92.

div1.p:
In Witness Whereof, I have set my hand and official seal this 9th
day of Aug. 1892.
div1.closer:
WmJMcKenna
Clerk of New York County.
